meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kristin Durianski Heather Montanye Joshua Brakhage Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6531.

td.p: Kristin Durianski, an attorney from Merrillville, Indiana
Heather Montanye, an environmental resource manager from Monticello, Florida
Joshua Brakhage, a TV news producer originally from South Coffeyville, Oklahoma (whose 3-day cash winnings total $49,605)

tr.td: PROVERBS
SENDING THINGS
THE APPROPRIATE SPORT THEY PLAYED
NOT JUST DESSERTS
MYTHOLOGICAL MISTAKES
THE ANIMA"LL" KINGDOM
